top_comments.comment: Wow!! Former Attorney General & Advocate of the Supreme Court, after seeing the facts stated - NCB stretched the case too far against Aryan ? NCB should take note.
NCB agencies need to investigate. Because this agency doing nothing for big dealer

comments_since_last_sample.body: He reminds of a great criminal lawyer in my country.. Malaysia..the late Mr Karpal Singh. These people have law running in their veins.
